description.@en: The world is going to end – there is no doubt in your mind. You treat every battle as if it would be your last. And, it must be a glorious end.

effect.@en: You immediately gain a Disorder. In addition, you can never wear armor as it violates your tenets. Should you don armor, you do not gain the benefits of any Professional Trait – Fanatic or otherwise – that you possess.
